statements: UPDATE production_data SET temperature = 100.5, vibration_level = 0.8 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE production_data SET vibration_level = 1.2, temperature = 98.7 WHERE machine_id = 25

UPDATE production_data SET temperature = 80.0, production_time = '08:30:00', vibration_level = 2.8 WHERE production_date = '2022-09-15' AND machine_id = 202;
UPDATE historical_production_data SET production_date = '2022-05-25' WHERE production_id = 1;
UPDATE predictive_maintenance SET maintenance_description = 'Routine Maintenance' WHERE maintenance_id = 3;
UPDATE historical_production_data SET production_date = '2020-01-01', production_data = '{"temperature": 25, "humidity": 60}' WHERE production_id = 100;
UPDATE predictive_maintenance SET maintenance_date = '2020-02-15', maintenance_description = 'Replaced faulty component' WHERE production_id = 100;
UPDATE ProductionData SET quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceLogs SET description = 'Routine maintenance completed on line A' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE ProductionData SET quantity = 1000 WHERE production_line_id = 1;
UPDATE MaintenanceLogs SET description = 'Routine maintenance completed successfully' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE ProductionData SET production_quantity = 1000 WHERE production_id = 123;
UPDATE MaintenanceLogs SET maintenance_hours = 5.5, maintenance_type = 'Routine' WHERE machine_id = 456;
UPDATE ProductionData SET production_quantity = 500, downtime_hours = 2.5 WHERE production_id = 100;
UPDATE MachineInformation SET manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp', installation_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE machine_id = 101;
UPDATE ProductionData SET temperature = 75.6, pressure = 30.2 WHERE timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' AND machine_id = 101;
UPDATE MaintenanceLog SET notes = 'Completed scheduled maintenance' WHERE maintenance_id = 1024;
UPDATE ProductionData SET temperature = 75.5, pressure = 1000.75 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' AND machine_id = 101
